channel.title: Gauntlet Con 2019 Games Being Posted Now!
channel.description: Pre-registration starts on September 28, but many of our guest and volunteer GMs are already posting their games in the [Gauntlet Con 2019 registration site](https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/events). Check out the range of events that will be there are the games get posted.
